Ionic dialect πειρητ-, τό, ={πεῖρα}, φόνια πειρατήρια the trial for murder, [LXX+5th c.BC+]; test, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; temptation, PLond.unpublished [Refs 4th c.AD+]
